page.title: 12LYCEUM THEATRE GHOSTS:2
page.content: and the dancer attended a performance of a play. They were seen by the whole of the astounded cast standing at the back of one of the boxes seemingly engrossed in the drama on the stage. The children who actually occupied the front seats of the box were totally oblivious of the two apparitions, as indeed were the rest of the audience. There is another ghostly story about the ballerina. During a play, the ballerina was seen by the audience as she danced across the stage from one side to the other. The tramp is seen (or rather heard), mostly on the stairs which lead to the gallery. I say heard rather than seen, because most people have heard the tramps heavy troubled breathing as he mounts the stairs. Nobody seems to know how the tramp
